verbs.description: [ARG0: Novartis AG Chief Executive Officer Vas Narasimhan] [V: said] [ARG1: the Swiss drugmaker “ made a mistake ” in signing up lawyer Michael Cohen to give the company insight on President Donald Trump ’s health - care plans] .
